title: Dreams & Goals
description: Learn vocabulary for talking about ambitions, wishes, and imaginary situations.

words.meaning: a strong desire to achieve something
words.example: Her ambition is to become a doctor.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 꿈은 의사가 되는 거예요.

words.meaning: a hope or dream of achieving something
words.example: Many students have aspirations of studying abroad.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 학생들이 해외 유학에 대한 열망이 있어요.

words.meaning: to succeed in doing something
words.example: She accomplished all her goals before turning 30.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 30살이 되기 전에 모든 목표를 이뤘어요.

words.meaning: to try to achieve over time
words.example: He decided to pursue his dream of being a musician.
words.exampleTranslation: 그는 음악가가 되겠다는 꿈을 추구하기로 했어요.

words.meaning: the quality of continuing despite difficulties
words.example: With determination, you can achieve anything.
words.exampleTranslation: 결단력이 있으면 무엇이든 이룰 수 있어요.

words.meaning: a strong feeling of enthusiasm
words.example: Her passion for music started when she was young.
words.exampleTranslation: 음악에 대한 그녀의 열정은 어렸을 때 시작되었어요.

words.meaning: the ability to develop in the future
words.example: Everyone has the potential to succeed.
words.exampleTranslation: 모든 사람은 성공할 잠재력이 있어요.

words.meaning: based on what is possible
words.example: It's important to set realistic goals.
words.exampleTranslation: 현실적인 목표를 세우는 것이 중요해요.

words.meaning: existing only in the mind
words.example: Children often have imaginary friends.
words.exampleTranslation: 아이들은 종종 상상 속 친구가 있어요.

words.meaning: imagined or suggested but not real
words.example: Let's discuss a hypothetical situation.
words.exampleTranslation: 가상의 상황에 대해 이야기해 봐요.

words.meaning: a chance to do something
words.example: This job is a great opportunity for growth.
words.exampleTranslation: 이 일은 성장을 위한 좋은 기회예요.

words.meaning: something that blocks your progress
words.example: Don't let obstacles stop you from pursuing your dreams.
words.exampleTranslation: 장애물이 꿈을 추구하는 것을 막지 못하게 하세요.

words.meaning: to give up something for something else
words.example: Success often requires sacrifice.
words.exampleTranslation: 성공은 종종 희생을 필요로 해요.

words.meaning: to achieve or realize something
words.example: I want to fulfill my potential.
words.exampleTranslation: 잠재력을 발휘하고 싶어요.

words.meaning: to feel sorry about something
words.example: I don't want to regret not trying.
words.exampleTranslation: 시도하지 않은 것을 후회하고 싶지 않아요.

words.meaning: the possibility of something bad happening
words.example: Sometimes you have to take risks to succeed.
words.exampleTranslation: 때때로 성공하려면 위험을 감수해야 해요.

words.meaning: the ability to do something difficult or dangerous
words.example: It takes courage to follow your dreams.
words.exampleTranslation: 꿈을 따르려면 용기가 필요해요.

words.meaning: to make someone want to do something
words.example: Her story inspired me to start my own business.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀의 이야기가 나에게 사업을 시작할 영감을 줬어요.

words.meaning: having a strong reason to do something
words.example: I feel more motivated when I have clear goals.
words.exampleTranslation: 명확한 목표가 있으면 더 동기 부여가 돼요.

words.meaning: to succeed in reaching a goal
words.example: She achieved her dream of becoming a pilot.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 조종사가 되겠다는 꿈을 이뤘어요.

words.meaning: having a lot of money
words.example: If I were wealthy, I would travel the world.
words.exampleTranslation: 부유하다면 세계 여행을 할 텐데요.

words.meaning: lucky
words.example: I feel fortunate to have such supportive friends.
words.exampleTranslation: 이렇게 도움을 주는 친구들이 있어서 운이 좋아요.

words.meaning: something that is more important than others
words.example: Health should be your top priority.
words.exampleTranslation: 건강이 최우선이 되어야 해요.

words.meaning: a problem that delays progress
words.example: Don't let setbacks discourage you.
words.exampleTranslation: 좌절로 인해 낙담하지 마세요.

words.meaning: an idea about the future
words.example: She has a clear vision for her future.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 미래에 대한 명확한 비전이 있어요.

words.meaning: to continue despite difficulties
words.example: You must persevere if you want to succeed.
words.exampleTranslation: 성공하고 싶다면 인내해야 해요.

words.meaning: the quality of being committed to a task
words.example: His dedication to his work is admirable.
words.exampleTranslation: 일에 대한 그의 헌신은 훌륭해요.

words.meaning: to try very hard to achieve something
words.example: We should strive for excellence in everything we do.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리가 하는 모든 일에서 탁월함을 위해 노력해야 해요.

words.meaning: an attempt to achieve a goal
words.example: This is a worthwhile endeavor.
words.exampleTranslation: 이것은 가치 있는 노력이에요.

words.meaning: a difficult task or problem
words.example: Learning a new language is a big challenge.
words.exampleTranslation: 새로운 언어를 배우는 것은 큰 도전이에요.

words.meaning: to succeed in dealing with a problem
words.example: She overcame many obstacles to get where she is today.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 오늘날의 위치에 도달하기 위해 많은 장애물을 극복했어요.

words.meaning: to have difficulty doing something
words.example: Many people struggle to balance work and family.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 사람들이 일과 가족의 균형을 맞추는 데 애를 먹어요.

words.meaning: a promise or firm decision to do something
words.example: Success requires commitment and hard work.
words.exampleTranslation: 성공은 헌신과 노력을 필요로 해요.

words.meaning: continuing despite difficulty
words.example: Persistence is key to achieving your goals.
words.exampleTranslation: 끈기는 목표 달성의 핵심이에요.

words.meaning: the ability to recover from difficulties
words.example: Building resilience helps you cope with challenges.
words.exampleTranslation: 회복력을 기르면 도전에 대처하는 데 도움이 돼요.

words.meaning: an imagined situation
words.example: It's nice to have fantasies, but you need realistic goals too.
words.exampleTranslation: 환상을 갖는 것도 좋지만 현실적인 목표도 필요해요.

words.meaning: the ability to form mental images
words.example: Children have amazing imagination.
words.exampleTranslation: 아이들은 놀라운 상상력을 가지고 있어요.

words.meaning: perfect or most suitable
words.example: This is the ideal job for me.
words.exampleTranslation: 이것이 저에게 이상적인 일이에요.

words.meaning: a strong wish for something
words.example: She has a strong desire to help others.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 다른 사람들을 돕고자 하는 강한 욕구가 있어요.

words.meaning: a strong wish for something
words.example: He felt a longing for his hometown.
words.exampleTranslation: 그는 고향에 대한 갈망을 느꼈어요.

words.meaning: a purpose or goal
words.example: My aim is to improve my English this year.
words.exampleTranslation: 올해 제 목표는 영어 실력을 향상시키는 거예요.

words.meaning: a goal or objective
words.example: We need to set clear targets for the project.
words.exampleTranslation: 프로젝트를 위한 명확한 목표를 세워야 해요.

words.meaning: forward movement toward a goal
words.example: You're making good progress with your studies.
words.exampleTranslation: 공부에서 좋은 진전을 보이고 있어요.

words.meaning: to move forward or make progress
words.example: Technology continues to advance rapidly.
words.exampleTranslation: 기술은 계속해서 빠르게 발전하고 있어요.

words.meaning: something you are trying to achieve
words.example: Our main objective is to increase sales.
words.exampleTranslation: 우리의 주요 목표는 판매를 늘리는 것이에요.

words.meaning: lack of success
words.example: Don't be afraid of failure; it's part of learning.
words.exampleTranslation: 실패를 두려워하지 마세요; 그것은 배움의 일부예요.

words.meaning: success in a competition or battle
words.example: The team celebrated their victory.
words.exampleTranslation: 팀은 승리를 축하했어요.

words.meaning: to overcome or defeat
words.example: She conquered her fear of public speaking.
words.exampleTranslation: 그녀는 대중 연설에 대한 두려움을 극복했어요.

words.meaning: to have a strong desire to achieve something
words.example: Many young people aspire to become famous.
words.exampleTranslation: 많은 젊은이들이 유명해지기를 열망해요.

words.meaning: a feeling that something desired will happen
words.example: Never lose hope, even in difficult times.
words.exampleTranslation: 어려운 시기에도 절대 희망을 잃지 마세요.

exercises.question: Her _____ is to become an astronaut one day.
You need _____ to face your fears.
He decided to _____ his dream of becoming an artist.
Success often requires hard work and _____.
It's important to set _____ goals that you can actually achieve.
Everyone has the _____ to succeed if they work hard.
I don't want to _____ not taking this opportunity.
Her _____ for cooking inspired her to open a restaurant.
Don't let _____ discourage you from pursuing your dreams.
그녀는 미래에 대한 명확한 비전이 있어요.
exercises.answer: She has a clear vision for her future.

exercises.question: Sometimes you have to take risks to succeed.
You must _____ if you want to succeed.
His _____ to his work is admirable.
일에 대한 그의 헌신은 훌륭해요.
exercises.answer: His dedication to his work is admirable.

exercises.question: We should strive for excellence in everything we do.
exercises.answer: 우리가 하는 모든 일에서 탁월함을 위해 노력해야 해요.

exercises.question: This is a worthwhile _____.
Learning a new language is a big _____.
She _____ many obstacles to get where she is today.

성공은 헌신과 노력을 필요로 해요.
exercises.answer: Success requires commitment and hard work.

exercises.answer: 그녀는 다른 사람들을 돕고자 하는 강한 욕구가 있어요.

exercises.answer: Her story inspired me to start my own business.
